Type Definitions.html#/c:JSQSystemSoundP.name: JSQSystemSoundPlayerCompletionBlock
Type Definitions.html#/c:JSQSystemSoundP.abstract: A completion block to be called after a system sound has finished playing.

Constants.html#/c:@kJSQSystemSoundPlayer.name: kJSQSystemSoundPlayerUserDefaultsKey
Constants.html#/c:@kJSQSystemSoundPlayer.abstract: The user defaults key to toggle and persist the on setting.

Classes/JSQSystemSoundPlayer.html#/c:obj.name: on
Classes/JSQSystemSoundPlayer.html#/c:obj.abstract: Returns whether or not the sound player is on.

Classes/JSQSystemSoundPlayer.html#/c:obj.name: bundle
Classes/JSQSystemSoundPlayer.html#/c:obj.abstract: The bundle in which the sound player uses to search for sound file resources. You may change this property as needed.

Classes/JSQSystemSoundPlayer.html#/c:obj.name: +sharedPlayer
Classes/JSQSystemSoundPlayer.html#/c:obj.abstract: Returns the shared JSQSystemSoundPlayer object. This method always returns the same sound system player object.

Classes/JSQSystemSoundPlayer.html#/c:obj.name: -initWithBundle:
Classes/JSQSystemSoundPlayer.html#/c:obj.abstract: Returns a new JSQSystemSoundPlayer instance with the specified bundle.

Classes/JSQSystemSoundPlayer.html#/c:obj.name: -init
Classes/JSQSystemSoundPlayer.html#/c:obj.abstract: Returns a new JSQSystemSoundPlayer instance using the main bundle.

Classes/JSQSystemSoundPlayer.html#/c:obj.name: -toggleSoundPlayerOn:
Classes/JSQSystemSoundPlayer.html#/c:obj.abstract: Toggles the sound player on or off by setting the kJSQSystemSoundPlayerUserDefaultsKey key in NSUserDefaults to the given value.

Classes/JSQSystemSoundPlayer.html#/c:obj.name: -playSoundWithFilename:fileExtension:completion:
Classes/JSQSystemSoundPlayer.html#/c:obj.abstract: Plays a system sound object corresponding to an audio file with the given filename and extension,

Classes/JSQSystemSoundPlayer.html#/c:obj.name: -playAlertSoundWithFilename:fileExtension:completion:
Classes/JSQSystemSoundPlayer.html#/c:obj.abstract: Plays a system sound object as an alert corresponding to an audio file with the given filename and extension,

Classes/JSQSystemSoundPlayer.html#/c:obj.name: -playSoundWithSoundID:asAlert:completion:
Classes/JSQSystemSoundPlayer.html#/c:obj.abstract: Plays the sound that corresponds to the specified SystemSoundID, optionally as an alert.

Classes/JSQSystemSoundPlayer.html#/c:obj.name: -stopSoundWithFilename:
Classes/JSQSystemSoundPlayer.html#/c:obj.abstract: Stops playing the sound with the given filename immediately.

Classes/JSQSystemSoundPlayer.html#/c:obj.name: -preloadSoundWithFilename:fileExtension:
Classes/JSQSystemSoundPlayer.html#/c:obj.abstract: Preloads a system sound object corresponding to an audio file with the given filename and extension.

Classes/JSQSystemSoundPlayer.html.name: JSQSystemSoundPlayer
Classes/JSQSystemSoundPlayer.html.abstract: The JSQSystemSoundPlayer class enables you to play sound effects, alert sounds, or other short sounds.

Type Definitions.html.name: Type Definitions
Type Definitions.html.abstract: The following type definitions are available globally.
